Design & development subscriptions for startups.

How it works

Once you join, you and your crew get an invite to our Breeew kanban board, where you can team up with Broke in real-time. From here, you can chat directly with Broke, shooting over as many design requests as you fancy.

I'll tackle each request step by step, and feel free to ask for as many tweaks as you need.

Good to know

Broke specializes in design and development, including  design system, front-end, prototypes, mobile apps, components, WordPress, back-end, hosting, integrations, Data and Analytics, marketing funnels & complex creations from Broke.

Broke excludes: graphic design, marketing assets, video, or copywriting.

Book an intro call

If not sure, you can book an intro call to learn more about Broke's services.

For bigger projects it can take up to 4 weeks." }, { 'question': "Why do you only have three spots?", 'answer': "Broke believes in providing the best possible service to clients, and to ensure that, Broke has decided to limit the workload to just three projects at a time. This approach allows Broke to dedicate its full attention and expertise to each project, ensuring quality and timely delivery." }, { 'question': "What if I don't like the design?", 'answer': "Broke wants you to be happy with the results! Hence the unlimited requests." }, { 'question': "Do you also write the content or copy?", 'answer': "I specialize in design and development services, so while I can bring your website to life with a visually appealing layout, I don't provide content writing services. You're responsible for creating and adding the content to your website." }, { 'question': "Do you also provide graphic design?", 'answer': "I only perform UI Design tasks and can create assets from your UI, however I do not create marketing assets or other commonly associated graphic design tasks." }, { 'question': "Are there any refunds?", 'answer': "Unfortunately, not. Because of the intense creative demands for delivering top-notch design and development within tight timeframes and the thorough research invested to achieve the best outcomes, Broke's cannot provide our services without compensation. However, we understand the importance of client satisfaction. If, after our initial discussion, it turns out that our services do not align with your needs and no work has been initiated, rest assured that you are eligible for a 100% refund. Broke value transparency and want our clients to feel confident in their interactions with Broke's." } ] %}

Timberstrap is 100% Open Source

Timberstrap Supercharges Your Development Experience.

Timberstrap is a Child Theme for LiveCanvas and low-code methodology that combined theme development with page builders in-order to unlock the power of WordPress.

Get Started Explore Features   \u2192

The wordpress workflow made for experts

Timberstrap removes limitations and empowers your creativity. Your possibilities are only bound by your imagination.

Here's Some Timberstrap chatter

@vscoder

This is unlike anything else in the WordPress ecosystem. No more limitations, complete customizability, and fast as hell.

@matt.gilbert

What a freaking blast Timberstrap is to use. I love never having to think about the limits of a page builder and instead focus on what the clients case about most.

@umbral

Coming from a custom development background, I was skeptical but with Timberstrap I am just knocking out requirements faster than ever.

Timberstrap massively improves your WordPress experience

1

Timber Framework

Empowering Developers with Twig and Timber right within LiveCanvas providing the dynamic data experience you deserve.

2
LiveCanvas Editor Tweaks

Timberstrap is made to enhance your LiveCanvas experience into a full low-code IDE that you can control and extend.

3

Live Low-code IDE

Live Low-code IDE: Revolutionize Your Workflow with Real-Time Control of Markup, CSS, and Dynamic Data, Plus Integrated Debugging.

4

Your Styling, Your Choice

Full autocomplete support compatibility with Tailwind, ACSS, Bootstrap, or Simply SCSS right within the LiveCanvas editor.

5

Developers Welcomed

With LiveCanvas you can do everything in LiveCanvas or using VS code to allow for seamless version control.

6

Extendable and Enjoyable

Unleash Your Creativity Without Boundaries in Timberstrap - Where There's No Limit to What You Can Build.

Total Freedom, Full Mastery

imberstrap's seamless integration with the entire plugin ecosystem enhances data accessibility and usage within LiveCanvas, simplifying your workflow.

Component Creation, Redefined

Ditch traditional page builders for Timberstrap, where crafting dynamic, reusable components and static partials becomes a breeze, all within WordPress or your child theme for optimal version control.

The Essence of Low-Code

Timberstrap isn't about emulating popular builders; it's about empowering professionals to craft unique client experiences effortlessly.

To Blocks or Not to Block?

Build Gutenberg Blocks with LiveCanvas and Twig using ACF or Metabox.

Unique Frontend Experiences

Using Timberstrap you can customize and build frontend experiences for any plugin.

Build Admin Pages

Personalize WordPress and Onboarding for your clients admin experience.

Unleashing Unlimited Possibilities Achieve what was once only imaginable

No more fumbling through requirements, you can make it simple and use premade shortcodes provided by plugins, or go full custom in a live editor environment with ease.

Query Anything

Using Twig and Timber you can gain access to data from anywhere in WordPress easily.

Dynamic Data Beast

Access data from any plugin, field, post type, or remote data easily.

Conditional Logic

Unlimited Conditional Logic with no limitations on conditional types.

SCSS Enabled

Use a framework or code your own SCSS framework.

Autocomplete & Snippets

No more drag and drop chaos, instantly access data, partials, and styles right from the editor.

Easy Client Handoffs

With Livecanvas, every client has a strudy content management experience that they will love.

Fetch Remote Data

No more looking for plugins to fetch data from remote sources, with Timberstrap it's as simple as 123.

Performance Focused

We're as lightweight as they come and we follow a zero bloat policy to ensure each and every site is fast.

Use the tools you love without the headaches.

This is the questions answers we are asked most often about Timberstrap.
